title: GSC_SST_Proposal
description: Schema defining the structure for Strategic System Transformation (SST) Proposals submitted to the Governance Steering Committee (GSC).

proposalId.description: Unique identifier for the proposal (e.g., GSC-SST-0042).

title.description: Concise, descriptive title for the proposal.

authorAddress.description: Cryptographic or system identity of the proposal author/submitter.

submissionTimestamp.description: Unix timestamp (in seconds) of formal submission.

startBlockOrTime.description: Block number or timestamp when voting begins.

endBlockOrTime.description: Block number or timestamp when voting ends.

durationHours.description: Specified duration in hours (used if Block/Time not static).

specification.description: Detailed technical implementation steps, contract payloads, or required configuration changes.

testCases.description: Links or hashes pointing to required simulation/test results.

dependencies.description: List of required proposals or contracts.

governanceRequirements.description: Minimum metrics required for successful passage and security.

minQuorumPercent.description: Minimum percentage of total supply/vote weight required to participate.

minApprovalPercent.description: Minimum percentage of participating votes required for passage (Simple Majority).

requiredSecurityDepositAmount.description: Amount of collateral required, specified in native tokens (Wei/Base unit format).
